items.title: Mind Expanding Books
items.content_text:
### Startups and Business

- Name: The Millionaire Fastlane: Crack the Code to Wealth and Live Rich for a Lifetime!

  Author: M.J. DeMarco

  Goodreads Rating: [4.28](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/18872437-the-millionaire-fastlane)

  Year Published: 2011


- Name: Crucial Conversations: Tools for Talking When Stakes Are High

  Author: Kerry Patterson, Joseph Grenny, Ron McMillan, Al Switzler

  Goodreads Rating: [4.05](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/15014.Crucial_Conversations)

  Year Published: 2002



### Philosophy And Psychology

- Name: The Almanack of Naval Ravikant: A Guide to Wealth and Happiness

  Author: Eric Jorgenson

  Goodreads Rating: [4.64](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/54898389-the-almanack-of-naval-ravikant)

  Year Published: 2020


- Name: The Way of the Monk

  Goodreads Rating: [4.10](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/45712959-the-way-of-the-monk)

  Year Published: 2020


- Name: The Subtle Art Of Not Giving a F\@ck: A Counterintuitive Approach to Living a Good Life

  Goodreads Rating: [3.91](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/28257707-the-subtle-art-of-not-giving-a-f-ck)

  Year Published: 2017


- Name: The Age of Em: Work, Love and Life When Robots Rule the Earth

  Author: Robin Hanson

  Goodreads Rating: [3.41](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/26831944-the-age-of-em)

  Year Published: 2016

items.title: Awesome Coq
items.content_text:
### Projects / Frameworks

*   [SSProve (⭐65)](https://github.com/SSProve/ssprove) - Framework for modular cryptographic proofs based on the Mathematical Components library.
items.content_html:
Projects / Frameworks

  • SSProve (⭐65) - Framework for modular cryptographic proofs based on the Mathematical Components library.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Register / Diagnostics

*   [desdic/macrothis.nvim (⭐31)](https://github.com/desdic/macrothis.nvim) - Save and load macros/registers.

### Code Runner / Diagnostics

*   [jaytyrrell13/static.nvim (⭐11)](https://github.com/jaytyrrell13/static.nvim) - Run static site generator commands.
items.content_html:
Register / Diagnostics

  • desdic/macrothis.nvim (⭐31) - Save and load macros/registers.

Code Runner / Diagnostics

  • jaytyrrell13/static.nvim (⭐11) - Run static site generator commands.

items.title: Awesome Developer First
items.content_text:
### GEO

*   [OpenCage](https://opencagedata.com/) - Forward and reverse geocoding API based on open data.
items.content_html:
GEO

  • OpenCage - Forward and reverse geocoding API based on open data.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Database Tools

*   [dg (⭐34)](https://github.com/codingconcepts/dg) - A fast data generator that produces CSV files from generated relational data.

### Date and Time

*   [approx (⭐14)](https://github.com/goschtalt/approx) - A Duration extension supporting parsing/printing durations in days, weeks and years.
items.content_html:
Database Tools

  • dg (⭐34) - A fast data generator that produces CSV files from generated relational data.

Date and Time

  • approx (⭐14) - A Duration extension supporting parsing/printing durations in days, weeks and years.
